casebody.data:
WALKER
v.
K&W CAFETERIAS, et al. 99PA19-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 23, 2019 Vernon Sumwalt, Attorney at Law, Charlotte, for Walker, Gwendolyn Dianette (Widow of Robert Lee Walker ). Mark T. Sumwalt, Attorney at Law, Charlotte. Lauren H. Walker, Attorney at Law. Roy G. Pettigrew, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for K&W Cafeterias, et al. Carl Newman, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for K&W Cafeterias, et al

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Appellee Brief filed on the 22nd of July 2019 by Defendants:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of July 2019."

Defendants shall have up to and including the 11th day of September 2019 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
